english.segment4: Congratulations. That's a book one hundred and two. No hesitation. To rip down your brother and your sister too. Better show some hesitation. With your predestination
english.segment5: Predestination. All you have hesitation. To look with your heart
english.segment6: To look with your heart. You think you know everything. Those who know God. Are known by God. Predestination. Is hesitation
